experiences.description: The tasks carried out are carrying out computer maintenance regularly, doing troubleshooting and installing hardware & software.
The task is to do Front End development using HTML, CSS, Javascript and CSS Bootstrap framework. Integration with NodeJS, Laravel or CodeIgniter frameworks.

The tasks carried out are carrying out the assembly of door hinges, ensuring that the stock of door hinge components is available, collecting components periodically, managing stock and orders for components so as not to exceed demand.
